summary: Build a premium, modern, mobile-friendly, fast-loading marketing website for the Pakistan-based car rental company “Islamabad Rent A Car and Tours / Islamabad Rent A Car”, featuring a luxury-themed homepage hero (faded collage limited to Prado, Land Cruiser, Audi, Revo, Civic), fleet listings organized into Luxury SUVs, Executive Sedans, Economy & Utility, and Group & Commercial Transport, a trust/benefits section, and a contact/booking section with provided contact details, Google Maps embed, booking form, and SEO keyword optimization.
architectural_notes: Use a premium theme (either Black+Gold luxury or Royal Blue+White corporate) with modern font (Poppins or Montserrat).
Homepage structure includes: Hero with faded car-collage background + overlay text + two CTAs; Fleet grid by category; Why Choose Us icons; Contact/Booking with map + form.
Performance requirements: mobile-friendly and fast loading (optimize images and minimize heavy assets).
Hero collage scope updated: include only Prado, Land Cruiser, Audi, Toyota Revo, and Honda Civic; exclude all other car models from the hero background.
Fleet section categories should include: Luxury SUVs, Executive Sedans, Economy & Utility, and Group & Commercial Transport (for Grand Cabin + Coaster variants).

Why Choose Us items updated to 6: Wide Range from Luxury to Group Transport; Well-Maintained & Clean Vehicles; Professional Drivers Available; 24/7 Customer Support; Transparent & Competitive Pricing; On-Time Pickup & Drop Service.
Contact details to display: Phone/WhatsApp +92 300 5125009; Email eaglenesttourism@gmail.com; Location: I-8 Markaz, 2000 Plaza, Islamabad, Pakistan.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Premium minibus photo of a Toyota Coaster Saloon (front 3/4 angle), clean background, high contrast, realistic style (car-coaster-saloon-4c.dim_1200x800.jpg)

existing_features.title: Create a single-page marketing website for “Islamabad Rent A Car and Tours” with a minimal, spacious, premium layout that is mobile-first, fast-loading, and easy to navigate; implement a simple top navigation that scrolls to sections (Home, Fleet, Why Choose Us, Contact/Booking).

Apply a consistent premium visual theme across the site using either Black+Gold (luxury) or Royal Blue+White (premium corporate) and modern typography (Poppins or Montserrat); keep spacing generous and components visually clean and high-end.

Implement the homepage Hero section with a full-width faded ‘watermark collage’ background featuring the specified car models, and overlay the exact headline/subheadline and two CTA buttons: “Book Your Car Now” and “Contact Us”.

Create the “Our Fleet” section as a clean, scrollable, visually balanced categorized grid with car cards for all specified vehicles, grouped into: Luxury SUVs, Executive Sedans, Economy & Family. Each car card must include a high-quality image, car name, 1-line description, rental availability (Daily / Weekly / Monthly), and a “Book Now” button.

Add a “Why Choose Us” section with a clean icon-based layout containing exactly the following benefit items: Well-Maintained Vehicles, Professional Drivers Available, 24/7 Customer Support, Affordable & Transparent Pricing, On-Time Delivery & Pickup.

Build the Contact/Booking section displaying the provided contact information, embed a Google Map for the provided location using an iframe embed, and implement a simple booking form with fields: Name, Phone Number, Car Selection, Rental Duration, Pickup Location, Message, and a “Confirm Booking” submit button.

Add on-page SEO basics: set appropriate page title, meta description, semantic headings (H1/H2), and include the provided target keywords naturally in visible page content; ensure Open Graph/Twitter preview metadata is present for sharing.

Add generated static image assets for the hero collage background and each fleet vehicle image, store them under frontend/public/assets/generated, and wire them into the Hero and Fleet sections (no backend image routing).

Add the following additional vehicles to the fleet data so they appear in the Fleet section and in the Booking form car selection list: Toyota Grand Cabin, Coaster 4C, and Coaster 5C. Each new vehicle must include: unique id, English name, a 1-line English description, category assignment, availability text (Daily / Weekly / Monthly), and a static image path under /assets/generated.

Update the homepage hero collage background image so it visually includes only these cars: Prado, Land Cruiser, Audi, Toyota Revo, and Honda Civic, and remove all other cars from the collage. Keep the same watermark/faded, premium dark tone style.

Update fleet data and the Fleet section taxonomy to include a dedicated “Group & Commercial Transport” category, and ensure vehicle grouping matches the requested categories: Luxury SUVs, Executive Sedans, Economy & Utility, and Group & Commercial Transport.

Update the “Group & Commercial Transport” vehicle descriptions to explicitly describe them as ideal for corporate groups, weddings, airport transfers, and tourism groups (in clear English, 1-line per vehicle).

Update the “Why Choose Us” section to show exactly these 6 benefit items (titles as written): “Wide Range from Luxury to Group Transport”, “Well-Maintained & Clean Vehicles”, “Professional Drivers Available”, “24/7 Customer Support”, “Transparent & Competitive Pricing”, and “On-Time Pickup & Drop Service”.
Update the Contact section’s Google Maps iframe embed so it accurately reflects the provided location: “I-8 Markaz, 2000 Plaza, Islamabad, Pakistan”.

Update SEO content to include the additional target keywords “Coaster rental Islamabad” and “Grand Cabin rent Pakistan” in on-page visible content and/or metadata, while keeping the existing premium car rental positioning and avoiding keyword stuffing.

Update the Fleet vehicle represented by the selected image element (/html/body/div/div/main/section[2]/div/div[5]/div[2]/div[2]/div[1]/img[1]) so it displays as “Toyota Coaster Saloon 4C” and uses a dedicated Saloon 4C image asset (instead of the current Coaster 4C image), by updating the corresponding entry in fleet data.

new_feature_requests.summary: Design and implement homepage hero with full-width faded watermark collage of specified cars, overlay headline/subheadline, and primary CTAs (Book Your Car Now, Contact Us)
Create 'Our Fleet' section: categorized grid (Luxury SUVs, Executive Sedans, Economy & Family) with car cards including image, name, 1-line description, rental availability, and Book Now button
Add 'Why Choose Us' icon-based benefits section (well-maintained vehicles, drivers available, 24/7 support, transparent pricing, delivery/pickup)
Build Contact section with displayed contact details, Google Map integration, and a simple booking form (name, phone, car selection, duration, pickup location, message) with Confirm Booking CTA

Apply premium visual system: Black+Gold OR Royal Blue+White theme, modern typography (Poppins or Montserrat), minimal spacious layout, luxury feel, simple navigation, mobile-first and performance-focused
SEO setup: optimize on-page content/metadata for target keywords provided (Islamabad car rental, luxury car rental Pakistan, Prado/Civic/Land Cruiser rentals, economy car rental Islamabad)

Implement backend persistence for booking submissions: add a Motoko API that accepts booking requests from the frontend and stores them in stable canister state with timestamp and a generated identifier; return a success response that the frontend can display after “Confirm Booking”.
Expand fleet listings to include additional vehicles: Toyota Grand Cabin and Coaster variants (4C, 5C), including corresponding car cards in the appropriate category
Update homepage hero watermark/collage background to include only: Prado, Land Cruiser, Audi, Toyota Revo, and Honda Civic; remove other cars from hero background

Update Fleet section taxonomy to include a dedicated “Group & Commercial Transport” category (Grand Cabin, Coaster 4C, Coaster 5C) and add copy describing these vehicles as ideal for corporate groups, weddings, airport transfers, and tourism groups

Update “Why Choose Us” benefit list to the 6 specified items (Wide Range, Well-Maintained & Clean, Professional Drivers, 24/7 Support, Transparent & Competitive Pricing, On-Time Pickup & Drop Service)

Update Contact section content to include Phone/WhatsApp +92 300 5125009, email eaglenesttourism@gmail.com, and location I-8 Markaz, 2000 Plaza, Islamabad, Pakistan (and ensure Google Maps embed matches this location)
Expand SEO target keywords to include coaster/grand-cabin specific terms (Coaster rental Islamabad, Grand Cabin rent Pakistan) alongside existing Islamabad/luxury/Prado/Civic terms

Do not implement any code changes yet; first obtain clarification from the user about the exact "one change" they want (what to change, desired new text/behavior/visuals, and where on the site it applies: Hero, Fleet, Why Choose Us, Contact/Booking, Footer, SEO, or booking backend).
Update fleet/booking car list to include or rename the vehicle as “Toyota Coaster Saloon 4C” (ensure it appears in Group & Commercial Transport with correct card text)

projectName: Islamabad Rent A Car and Tours
